data.meanings: to swing, halt in a place, move, toss. Mankind, people, others, men.
data.sentence: The word النَّاسِ comes from the root ن و س and is associated with the meanings: to swing, halt in a place, move, toss. Mankind, people, others, men.
The word اكْتَالُوا comes from the root ك ي ل and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Lam) To measure, weigh, compare.

data.meanings: to reach the end, keep ones promise, fulfil ones engagement, pay a debt, perform a promise. tawaffa - to die. wafaat - death.
data.sentence: The word يَسْتَوْفُونَ comes from the root و ف ي and is associated with the meanings: to reach the end, keep ones promise, fulfil ones engagement, pay a debt, perform a promise. tawaffa - to die. wafaat - death.
